MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA1 postcode area of Kilmarnock. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:30am to complete repairs on our equipment located near Nursery Gardens and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:52am on Tuesday, 06 April 2021
